short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sanitizes text before it can be entered into various input fields online. EASY config checkboxes. No Guarantee or Warranty.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sanitizer extension, attempts to SANITIZE information before it can be entered into forms by unsuspecting children and the elderly as well as users who simply want a little more peace of mind. This doesn't work for every online input field but it does work on most input forms. Items like: Credit Card Number, Social Security Number, Bank Account Number and more can easily be configured in the extension with simple checkboxes. This Extension Does Not Collect Your Data.
